titleStmt.title: Of ejaculatory prayer the necessity there is of it, the advantages there are for it, and the advantages there are by it : demonstrated with several directions for the practice of it / by Theophilus Polwheile ...
titleStmt.author: Polwheile, Theophilus, d. 1689.

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: p. 77 misnumbered 76, p. 124 misnumbered 248.
Imperfect: print show-through and slightly faded.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
